trans-unit.source: To implement a custom upgrade acceptor, inherited from this `abstract` base class.
An example of a stream upgrade is to build a compression stream directly on top of the transport stream.
This class is used with <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeInitiator> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeProvider> to implement a custom stream upgrade.
For a detailed description of the upgrade process, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeProvider>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor"></xref> class.
Upgrades the transport stream and returns the upgraded stream.
This method can be used to wrap the existing transport stream by providing additional capabilities; for example, a compressing stream.
The stream to be upgraded.
Returns the upgraded stream.
Asynchronous version of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor.AcceptUpgrade(System.IO.Stream)"></xref>.
For more information, see the remarks for <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor.AcceptUpgrade%2A>.
The stream to be upgraded.
The method to be called when the `AcceptUpgrade` call has completed.
State information for the `AcceptUpgrade` call.
Returns a result code that is passed into EndAcceptUpgrade to access the upgraded stream.
Determines whether the upgrade requested is supported by this upgrade acceptor.
The developer can inspect the requested content type and determine whether the resulting upgrade can be performed by this upgrade acceptor.
This content type comes from the `GetNextUpgrade` method on the matching upgrade initiator.
The type of content to be checked.
`true` if this kind of upgrade is supported; otherwise, `false`.
Asynchronous version of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor.AcceptUpgrade(System.IO.Stream)"></xref>.
For more information, see the remarks in <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.StreamUpgradeAcceptor.AcceptUpgrade%2A>.
The IAsyncResult returned from `BeginAcceptUpgrade`.
Returns the upgraded stream.
